episode: I learned my friend had died a few weeks after the event and missed the funeral.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I learned my friend had died a few weeks after the event and missed the funeral.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm really sorry to hear that. It must be tough not being able to say goodbye.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes.  I didn't know her family so they understandably didn't let me know.  I did go to where her ashes were scattered which was an odd experience on my own.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds really tough. I'm glad you found a way to say goodbye in your own way.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I have some roses in my garden in her memory - they were her favourites.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a beautiful tribute. I'm sure she would have loved that.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Died too young and made me think of all the time/experiences we missed out on together.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's really hard to lose someone so young. Those missed moments are tough to think about.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I try to make the most of the years I have now but still think of her.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a wonderful way to honor her memory while living fully.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Try not to focus too much on work as that was one of her down falls which didn't get her any where.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a good lesson to keep in mind. Balance is key.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: We work to live.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Absolutely.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: She was always promised promotions and pay rises but despite long hours they never seem to come.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's really unfair.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was always there to listen and she was always very appreciative of that.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's so important.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Something I'm glad I did.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's really meaningful.
